name: Youtube full-screen (WIP)
description: a css style to create a full screen video system on youtube with useful controls within ease of access
additional_info:
still needs a lot of code tweaking to be fully compatible with all users.
has some derpy glitches when used on "official" music channels.

Updated-12-1-15 removed a lot of junk code that was messing things up. Basic Full-screen setup with "sentiments" video title and youtuber profile pic all in  top menu bar for quick access 
Considering moving share links for access too..?
